full_threads.body:
Hi Melanie, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://www.bellpartners.com/contact/port-macquarie/
https://www.bellpartners.com/contact/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Note: If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it to us in a new email. This helps us avoid confusion and ensures a faster, more focused response.

Hi Guys,

Please see below response from my recent request.

Please amend.

Thank you!

Warm regards,



Melanie Bulic

Executive Assistant to CEO & Executive Team









CLICK HERE TO SUPPORT THE LOYAL FOUNDATION.

Office: 40 Lime Street, King Street Wharf Sydney NSW 2000

Postal: Boxes 9-11, 26a Lime Street, King Street Wharf Sydney NSW 2000

T: +61 2 9249 7600 | D: +61 2 9249 7627 | F: +61 2 9249 7699 | http://www.bellpartners.com/
